channel.title: Java image formats
channel.description:
I'm looking for a file format that supports partial transparency AND animation AND can be readable by java.
I know that PNG has partial transparency, and GIF has animation, isnt there a way to mix the two? (I'm really trying to avoid loading the PNG images in an array and looping through them... I saw somewhere that .MNG (created by the same people who created PNG i guess) it has support for transparency and animation, but I can't load the file type using java. I used the regular Image object to hold the mng type but got nothing when i tried to draw it (assuming java does not support mng).
[code] this.image[2] = (new ImageIcon(this.getClass().getResource("./locationToFile/" + fileName + ".mng"))).getImage(); [/code]
^ wont work: Returns an image which gets pixel data from the specified file, whose format can be either GIF, JPEG or PNG.
I tried to google keywords such as partial transparency java animation custom image format I/O and could not find much relevant results.
Edit: I've been looking at this, and i do recall my teacher being able to animate PNG images using adobe fireworks.. http://andre.engelbrechtonline.net/blog/2010/04/17/animated-png-web/

item.title: Java image formats
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

http://www.venus.dti.ne.jp/~i-shinya/mngplay/alpha/mngplay.jar

< 30 secs on google.

I think this is a library for reading MNG images (also includes JNG and PNG) but I’m unable to decipher the page.

Read full topic

item.title: Java image formats
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

I need partial transparency (one that PNG support) … Apparently the new animated pngs have support for animation but java does not support the animation bits of it. And gif supports 1 bit transparency only? Either transparent or its not, nothing in between

It’s going to be for things such as a lamp or light source that fades away with distance

Read full topic

item.title: Java image formats
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Gif supports transparency, isn’t that what you wanted?

Read full topic

item.title: Java image formats
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

eczema3:

make your own image type, and write a library for java

if you weren’t kidding I actually thought about something like this, extending an existing image class to support the MNG format, but i dont know where to begin, any helpful pointers?

Read full topic
